channel.title: Creating a minigame?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i would like to know if it is possible for me to create my own mini game?
Like, ure in a area of the minigame, u have to fight off a monster, when you have killed that a harder one spawn and so on untill the end, also could i make a special point system like pk points but these points are for this unique mini game and also a rewards shop which requires these points to beable to purchace the items from that shop?
All help appreciated, Thanks, Jake.

MErge some tutorials together for this affect tbh.
